title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 411.3 - Outpatient fee schedule
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 411.3 - Outpatient fee schedule

State Regulations

The fee schedule for outpatient hospital services rendered
under the Volunteer Ambulance Workers' Benefit Law on or after July 1, 1995
shall be the schedule of fees for outpatient hospital services under the

Workers' Compensation Law of the State of New York applicable to outpatient
hospital services rendered on or after July 1, 1995, as set forth in sections
329.6 and 329.7 of this Title. This outpatient fee schedule is applicable in
accordance with section 329.6 of this Title. The fee schedule for outpatient
hospital services rendered under the Volunteer Ambulance Workers' Benefit Law
on a date prior to July 1, 1995 shall be the schedule of fees for outpatient
hospital services under the Workers' Compensation Law of the State of New York
in effect on the date on which the outpatient hospital services were rendered, regardless of the date of accident. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
411.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
